actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for commuting expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individual taxpayers an income tax deduction from gross income for commuting expenses. Defines "commuting expenses" as the amounts paid or incurred for the transportation of such taxpayers between their residence and their principal place of employment or self-employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for commuting expenses.
